title: React.js Fundamentals
instructorBio: Expert React developer with 8+ years of experience
description: Master the basics of React with hands-on projects and real-world examples.
fullDescription:
This comprehensive course covers everything you need to know about React.js.

You'll learn:
- JSX and component fundamentals
- Hooks (useState, useEffect, useContext)
- Props and state management
- Component lifecycle
- Routing with React Router
- Performance optimization
- Best practices and patterns

title: Advanced TypeScript
description: Deep dive into TypeScript advanced features and best practices.
fullDescription:
Master advanced TypeScript concepts and patterns.

You'll learn:
- Advanced types and generics
- Decorators and metadata
- Module augmentation
- Conditional types
- Mapped types
- Utility types
- Type-safe patterns

title: Mobile App Development
instructorBio: Mobile development expert with cross-platform experience
description: Build native mobile apps with React Native from scratch.
fullDescription:
Learn to build cross-platform mobile applications.

You'll learn:
- React Native fundamentals
- Navigation and routing
- Native device features
- App store deployment
- Performance optimization
- UI/UX best practices

title: AI & Machine Learning
instructorBio: AI researcher and machine learning practitioner
description: Introduction to AI and ML algorithms with practical implementations.
fullDescription:
Explore the world of artificial intelligence and machine learning.

You'll learn:
- Machine learning fundamentals
- Neural networks and deep learning
- Computer vision
- Natural language processing
- Model deployment
- Ethics in AI

title: Data Science 101
instructorBio: Data scientist with experience in analytics and visualization
description: Learn data analysis and visualization with Python and popular libraries.
fullDescription:
Start your journey in data science and analytics.

You'll learn:
- Python for data analysis
- Pandas and NumPy
- Data visualization
- Statistical analysis
- Machine learning basics
- Real-world projects

title: Web Design Mastery
instructorBio: Creative web designer and UI/UX specialist
description: Create beautiful and functional websites with modern design principles.
fullDescription:
Master the art of web design and user experience.

You'll learn:
- Design principles and theory
- UI/UX best practices
- Figma and design tools
- Responsive design
- Color theory and typography
- Portfolio projects
